channel.title: 562 Webclient problem
channel.description:
Hello all,
I did all the steps in making a webclient and I uploaded the JAR signer that I created. The problem is that when I put it on the website, nothing loaded.. and instead it showed two links saying jos.jar and webclient.jar.
So yeah.. any help would be appreciated.
Thanks.
EDIT: I got another problem now, i put the code onto the page and it says "error- click for details" and the screen goes white. Anybody know what I could do to fix this?

item.title: 562 Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @NickIceypvp NickIceypvp
item.description:
@NickIceypvp wrote:

[quote=“markdabest33, post:3, topic:398333”][quote author=NickIceypvp link=topic=495467.msg3622395#msg3622395 date=1307549523]
Hello all,

I did all the steps in making a webclient and I uploaded the JAR signer that I created. The problem is that when I put it on the website, nothing loaded… and instead it showed two links saying jos.jar and webclient.jar.

So yeah… any help would be appreciated.

Thanks.

EDIT: I got another problem now, i put the code onto the page and it says “error- click for details” and the screen goes white. Anybody know what I could do to fix this?
[/quote]

ow yh did u upload the webclient.html or webclient.php to the website then click on it then it should work (if u want rep++ if it worked)

EDIT: I got another problem now, i put the code onto the page and it says “error- click for details” and the screen goes white. Anybody know what I could do to fix this?

which tut u followed? just to get a better understanding of the code u entered… =)[/quote]

I followed Laurent 248’s guide. And thanks for that, i kinda uploaded the wrong thing. But, now im having another problem lol. My webclient goes white and says this message:

"The requested URL /error_game_invalidhost.ws was not found on this server.

Additionally, a 404 Not Found error was encountered while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request." How can I fix this? thanks

Read full topic
